name: Infinity Blade II
summary: From Epic Games and ChAIR Entertainment comes Infinity Blade II, the sequel to the critically acclaimed, best-selling iOS game Infinity Blade. Infinity Blade II continues to raise the bar for triple-A mobile gaming. Journey into the world of the Deathless tyrants and their legion of Titans. Build skills and upgrade characters… all while delving deeper into this mysterious, timeless adventure.
info:
• 中文名: 无限剑刃II
  • 开发: ChAIR Entertainment Group
  • 平台: iPhone
  • 游戏类型: Action，RPG，Adventure
  • 游戏引擎: Unreal3
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2011-12-01
  • 售价: $6.99
  • 官方网站: http://infinitybladegame.com/
